sourcesContent:
Registration Form

First name is required Enter Only Characters
Lastname is required Enter Only Characters
Emailid is required Enter Valid Email Address
Password is required Password must contain more than 8 characters, 1 numeric, 1 upper case letter, and 1 special character($@$!%*?&).
Confirm Password is required The entered Password not match
Customers_id Firstname Lastname Email Actions
